fields.title: Title
fields.name: title
fields.description: The title of your document. Displayed at the top of the page, in browser tabs, and in page metadata.

fields.title: Description
fields.name: description
fields.description: The page description used for page metadata, search engines, and social media previews.

fields.title: Page Template
fields.name: template
fields.description: The layout template for the page. Use 'splash' for a wider layout without sidebars.

fields.title: Draft
fields.name: draft
fields.description: Mark this page as a draft. It will not be included in production builds.

fields.title: Hero Section
fields.name: hero
fields.description: Optional hero section for splash pages. See https://starlight.astro.build/reference/frontmatter/#hero

fields.name: file
fields.title: Image Path
fields.description: Relative path to an image in your repository (e.g., ~/assets/logo.png).

fields.name: dark
fields.title: Dark Mode Image Path
fields.description: Image to use for dark mode.

fields.name: light
fields.title: Light Mode Image Path
fields.description: Image to use for light mode.

fields.name: html
fields.title: Image HTML
fields.description: Raw HTML to use in the image slot, e.g., an inline <svg>.

fields.title: Custom Slug
fields.name: slug
fields.description: Override the URL slug for this page.

fields.title: Last Updated Date
fields.name: lastUpdated
fields.description: Override the date shown for the last update. If not set, uses Git history.

fields.title: Exclude from Search
fields.name: pagefind
fields.description: Set to false to exclude this page from search results.

fields.title: Previous Page Link
fields.name: prev
fields.description: Set to false to hide the 'previous page' link.

fields.title: Next Page Link
fields.name: next
fields.description: Set to false to hide the 'next page' link.

fields.title: Table of Contents
fields.name: tableOfContents
fields.description: Customize the table of contents for this page.

fields.name: content
fields.title: Banner Content
fields.description: HTML content for the banner. Can include links.
